title: No, a Philippine senator who is a critic of President Rodrigo Duterte did not test positive for drugs
subtitle: A website claims that Philippine Senator Antonio Trillanes, one of President Rodrigo Duterte’s critics, tested positive for taking drugs in a test for lawmakers conducted by the Senate. The official results obtained by AFP show Trillanes tested negative.
author: factcheck.afp.com
vclaim:
No, a Philippine senator who is a critic of President Rodrigo Duterte did not test positive for drugs

A website claims that Philippine Senator Antonio Trillanes, one of President Rodrigo Duterte’s critics, tested positive for taking drugs in a test for lawmakers conducted by the Senate. The official results obtained by AFP show Trillanes tested negative.

The pinoynewsbayan website claims that Trillanes tested positive for drugs when he took the drug test in July.



AFP obtained the official results from the Senate after Trillanes signed a form waiving his privacy rights.

Below is the negative drug test result released by the Senate:

Trillanes also released the drug test results on Twitter.
